summary: ROTOR VIBRATION ISSUE WITH MY 2000 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE LAREDO 4WD.  VERY BAD AND JEEP WILL NOT DEAL WITH IT DUE TO MILEAGES AND BECAUSE ONLY IS SERVICE BULLETIN AND NOT A RECALL ITEM.*AK    AT 17,000 MILES REPORTED ISSUES; BUT THE SERVICE TECHS. FAILED TO INFORM ME AND ALSO TO DO THE BRAKE REPLACEMENT KIT RECOMENDED BY THE SERVICE BULLETIN.    NOW THEY WILL NOT FIT THE ROTORS DUES TO THE MILEAGE ISSUE.    EVEN WITH WORN BRAKES I HAVE NEVER HAD VIBRATION ISSUE LIKE THIS AND FRANKLY ITS A SAFETY ISSUE!!!!!!!!!!!!!! AT THIS POINT.
